info.description: Creates a Linked Rate Personal Loan
info.title: createLinkedRateLoan

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

partyIds.description: It is an unique identifier of a customer or party

partyId.description: It is an unique identifier of a customer or party

partyRoles.description: Indicates the role of a customer or party, Eg: Benefial Owner, Nominee etc

partyRole.description: Indicates the role of a customer or party, Eg: Benefial Owner, Nominee etc

agentCustomerIds.description: It is a unique identifier of an agent

agentCustomerId.description: It is a unique identifier of an agent

agentArrangementIds.description: Indicates the unique reference of an agent account

agentArrangementId.description: Indicates the unique reference of an agent account

agentRoles.description: Indicates the role of a agent

agentRole.description: Indicates the role of a agent

arrangmentId.description: It is the unique identifier of an arrangement account

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

currency.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

productVariation.description: It defines the type of a customer based on criteria defined by Bank, Eg: Gold Customer, Mobile Banking Customer

pricingSelection.description: If the account has an associated pricing arrangement, the way the pricing is applied is indicated from standard set of values - automatic, manual or No Pricing.

pricingPlan.description: Indicates the Pricing Plan of an account, it gives preferential interest rate/charge schedule based on customer segment

rewardsArrangementId.description: Indicates the Rewards account id assigned to a financial account(Loans,Deposits)

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

arrangementEffectiveDate.description: It is a date on/upon which an account is considered to take effect

reason.description: Indicates the reason for performing an activity

fixed.description: Indicates the fixed interest rate applied to an account

minMaxRate.description: Indicates whether minimum and maximum rate defined for the tier

maxRate.description: Indicates the maximum/minimum rate of a tier for interest/charge calculation

effectiveRate.description: Indicates the actual interest rate applied for the account after adjustment/tier calculation/based on basic or Periodic index value

upTo.description: indicates the date upto which rate was applicable

negativeRate.description: Indicates the negative interest rate applied to an account

marginOperation.description: Indicates the type of operators to adjust the MARGIN.RATE of an interest for an account(Add/Subtract/Mutiply)

marginRate.description: This is the rate applied over the default interest rate or commission rate to achieve the actual rate.

value.description: The value of the field on which the Alert criteria is based

linkedArrangement.description: The account which is linked for calculating interest that should be applied to this account

effectiveRate.description: Indicates the actual interest rate applied for the account after adjustment/tier calculation/based on basic or Periodic index value

negativeRate.description: Indicates the negative interest rate applied to an account

marginType.description: Defines whether there are single or multiple margins to be considered while arriving at the applicable interest rate  Allowed values:  null (default): multiple margins may be defined SINGLE: only a single margin is allowed

marginOperation.description: Indicates the type of operators to adjust the MARGIN.RATE of an interest for an account(Add/Subtract/Mutiply)

marginRate.description: This is the rate applied over the default interest rate or commission rate to achieve the actual rate.

references.description: Indicates the transaction reference for which the history of transactions is requested. It is steered by the attribute 'booked' given the start date and end date or the entry from which the history is requested

customType.description: Indicates the method to calculate the custom rate for an interest component

changeAmount.description: Indicates the amount by which the original commitment amount increased or decreased.

term.description: Indicates the term for which the contract is booked

revolving.description: Indicates if commitment is revolving or non revolving in nature

updateLimit.description: Flag to indicate whether the commitment amount used for an account should be updated and shown on the LIMIT table

aaaId.description: The Identifier of the aa record created

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
